thread.title: The War On Drugs Releasing New Single “Thinking Of A Place” On Record Store Day
thread.title_full: The War On Drugs Releasing New Single “Thinking Of A Place” On Record Store Day

author: Stereogum
title: The War On Drugs Releasing New Single “Thinking Of A Place” On Record Store Day
text: Following the release of 2014's excellent Lost In The Dream , Philly rockers the War On Drugs signed a two-album deal with Atlantic Records . Now, after a few years of silence barring a Grateful Dead cover , Adam Granduciel and co. are finally set to reveal what they've been working on at their new … More »
